body: Undines are defined by class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Undines have the following racial traits.
name: Undine

sections.body: Undines are both perceptive and agile, but tend to adapt rather than match force with force.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, -2 Strength

sections.body: Undines have a swim speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Speed

sections.body: Undines can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Hydraulic push 1/day. (Caster level equals the undine's total Hit Dice.)
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.body: Undines begin play speaking Common and Aquan. Undines with high Intelligence scores can choose any of the following bonus languages: Auran, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, Ignan, and Terran.
sections.name: Languages
